targets.expr: kubernetes.container_name:relay "Processing pod" | unpack_logfmt | queue_len:>0 | stats by(_time:1s) min(queue_len)
8 * sum(rate(node_network_transmit_bytes_total{device!~".*br.*",device!~"veth.+"})) by (instance, host, device) * on(instance) group_left(nodename) node_uname_info
histogram_quantile(0.95, sum(rate(apiserver_request_duration_seconds_bucket{verb!="WATCH"}[5m])) by (le, resource, verb)) and on(resource, verb) (rate(apiserver_request_duration_seconds_count) >= 10)
